celestialwynn.name: Celestial Wynn
celestialwynn.config.item_scale.descript: Control the size of held items while in first person
celestialwynn.cape_fix.description: Fixes capes floating when players have their armor hidden with a Silverbull subscription
celestialwynn.cape_fix.wavey_capes_insta: This setting is unavailable as you have Wavey Capes installed, which doesn't suffer from this issue.
celestialwynn.hide_territory_bar.descrip: Hides the persistent territory/guild bar at the top of the screen when enabled
Note that this will also hide the bomb timer if you aren't using the bomb timer overlay from Wynntils or fuy.gg!
celestialwynn.hide_shouts.description: Hides shouts from chat. This is designed to be used with the Wynntils chat tabs feature turned off!
celestialwynn.mute_spells.description: Reduces the volume of the ding sound effect played when a spell is cast
celestialwynn.channel_mode.description: Controls the behavior of how the chat channel is handled when using /chat
celestialwynn.fov_scaling.description.li: Alternative FOV scaling functions which reduce how much your FOV is modified by effects such as Speed and sprinting.
Note that this feature does not fully remove FOV scaling; if you wish to remove it entirely, turn off FOV Effects in Minecraft's Accessibility Settings instead.
celestialwynn.item.x.description: Moves the held item left or right across the screen; note that this slider is inverted if your main hand is set to left handed
celestialwynn.item.y.description: Moves the held item up or down across the screen
celestialwynn.item.z.description: Moves the held item towards or away from the camera
celestialwynn.item.scale.description: Modifies how large in scale held items should appear
celestialwynn.command.chat.set: Messages will now be sent in %s chat
celestialwynn.command.fov_scaling.unknow: %s is not a recognized FOV scaling function
celestialwynn.command.hide_territory_bar: The territory bar will no longer be hidden
The territory bar is now hidden
